jobs_results.title: Software Engineer (Android)
jobs_results.description:
About Revolut

People deserve more from their money. More visibility, more control, and more freedom. Since 2015, Revolut has been on a mission to deliver just that. Our powerhouse of products ‚Äî including spending, saving, investing, exchanging, travelling, and more ‚Äî help our 50+ million customers get more from their money every day.

As we continue our lightning-fast growth, 2 things are essential to our success: our people and our culture. In recognition of our outstanding employee experience, we've been certified as a Great Place to Work‚Ñ¢. So far, we have 10,000+ people working around the world, from our offices and remotely, to help us achieve our mission. And we're looking for more brilliant people. People who love building great products, redefining success, and turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution.

About The Role

Our Technology team isn‚Äôt just one of the best in the industry, it‚Äôs one of the

best in the world. And we‚Äôre proud of it. It‚Äôs our driving force; our engine üöÄ From building a new banking backend to creating an award-winning app, there‚Äôs nothing (and we mean nothing) our tech team can‚Äôt do.

Our Technology team isn‚Äôt here to fix legacy systems ‚Äì it‚Äôs here to build world-class financial products from the ground up. Products that will be used by millions of people around the world (18+ million people, not that we‚Äôre counting) üåé

We‚Äôre looking for Android Developers interested in every step, stage and release of a feature. Want to work alone? This isn‚Äôt for you. We want communicators. One minute you‚Äôre chatting to your PO, the next a designer, the next a customer (for feature feedback, we don‚Äôt need you on the phones) üì£ Like your projects varied? This is for you. We don‚Äôt pigeonhole. We want you to spread your wings and stick your beak into as many places as possible. Fancy it‚ùì

We use: Kotlin, Dagger 2, RxJava 2, Room.

What You‚Äôll Be Doing
‚Ä¢ Collaborating closely with product designers with a focus on new feature design and prototyping
‚Ä¢ Be involved in the user experience design process, from wireframes and mockups through implementation and release
‚Ä¢ Working closely with designers and business to define and implement elegant solutions to interesting problems
‚Ä¢ Helping define and maintain visual guidelines and ensure consistency throughout the app
‚Ä¢ Fast prototyping of new user interactions and iteration based on feedback from peer

What You'll Need
‚Ä¢ Deep understanding of the Android SDK
‚Ä¢ Experience working on apps which support multiple Android devices
‚Ä¢ Experience collaborating on software projects with design and backend aspects
‚Ä¢ Quick learner with an ambitious and results driven personality
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and organisational skills
‚Ä¢ Ability to work well as part of a team in a fast-paced environment
‚Ä¢ Fluent English

Nice to have
‚Ä¢ Insightful opinions about developing for mobile
‚Ä¢ A GitHub account with some cool projects in it
‚Ä¢ Experience in financial services
‚Ä¢ Knowledge/experience working with Hashmaps
‚Ä¢ Working in TDD approach

Building a global financial super app isn‚Äôt enough. Our Revoluters are a priority, and that‚Äôs why in 2021 we launched our inaugural D&I Framework, designed to help us thrive and grow everyday. We're not just doing this because it's the right thing to do. We‚Äôre doing it because we know that seeking out diverse talent and creating an inclusive workplace is the way to create exceptional, innovative products and services for our customers. That‚Äôs why we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to join this multicultural, hard-working team.

Refer to our Data Privacy Statement for Candidates for details on our data handling practices during your application.

jobs_results.title: Lead Android Developer: Shape the Future of Digital Solutions
jobs_results.description:
Unlock a world of innovation and creativity as Meteor's Lead Android Developer. Join our team of experts in developing cutting-edge digital display solutions that redefine traditional screens.

About Us

At Meteor, we're dedicated to crafting seamless user experiences and harnessing the power of cutting-edge technology. Our collaborative environment fosters continuous learning, offering meaningful opportunities for team members to contribute directly to pioneering digital solutions.

About the Role

As our Lead Android Developer, you'll play a pivotal role in shaping the next generation of Android applications for our clients. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create robust, responsive, and high-standard applications. Build features from scratch and refine existing components to deliver exceptional user experiences.

Key Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions.
‚Ä¢ Design client-side and server-side architecture.
‚Ä¢ Build front-end applications through appealing visual design and attention to detail.
‚Ä¢ Reuse components to maintain clear code.
‚Ä¢ Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
‚Ä¢ Test software for responsiveness and efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade software.
‚Ä¢ Create security and data protection settings.
‚Ä¢ Develop features and applications with responsive design.
‚Ä¢ Write technical documentation.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to improve software.

Required Skills and Qualifications

Strong Technical Foundation
‚Ä¢ Expertise in Android SDK, different versions of Android, and screen size management.
‚Ä¢ Understanding of Android Porting and Build process.
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience in Native app development.
‚Ä¢ Experience with Video Processing, offline storage, threading, and performance tuning.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Android SDK, Java, Kotlin, Jetpack components, SQLite Database, and MVVM Architecture.
‚Ä¢ Ability to manage the full technical lifecycle of Android applications.

Nice-to-Have Qualifications
‚Ä¢ Minimum 3 years of experience with Kotlin.
‚Ä¢ FireTV/OTT application development expertise.
‚Ä¢ Smart TV apps development experience.
‚Ä¢ CI/CD pipelines and Server management knowledge.
‚Ä¢ Multi-platform hybrid platform language proficiency.
‚Ä¢ Backend language: NodeJS.

Benefits

Enjoy a competitive base salary of $4,000 - $6,000 depending on your experience and location. As a Full-time Contractor, you'll work remotely from Argentina (Work from home) with a schedule of Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM.

Recruiting Process

Our comprehensive recruiting process includes:
‚Ä¢ Application / Screening: Complete a short questionnaire and provide additional inputs to assess your qualifications.
‚Ä¢ Skill Assessment: Complete exercises and/or projects designed to recreate work tasks for this role.
‚Ä¢ Skill Assessment Interview: Participate in a 60-90 minute conversation to evaluate your skills and culture fit.
‚Ä¢ Hiring Manager Final Interview: Engage in a 30-60 minute conversation to discuss expectations and vision for the role.

jobs_results.title: Fullstack mobile developer with flutter
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for an outstanding Mobile Developer with solid knowledge in Flutter to join our software engineering team for international projects. We offer a very friendly atmosphere for you to develop your skills as well as a competitive salary.

Knowledge, Skills & Experience Required

- BA/BSc in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related subject
- 2+ years of software development experience
- Flutter, Dart, Android Studio/ Visual Studio, Git Version Control
- Concurrency, RESTful, JSON & XML, MVC
- MVVM-C
- Push Notifications
- It is key that you are used to and have experience with Test
- Driven Development and Pairing
- Experience with Software Development & Project Management tools (CA Agile Central, Atlassian Jira)
- Source Code Management (GIT), CI/CD (Jenkins, Concourse)
- Analytics SDKs
- Unit testing Quick and Nimble
- Good analytical and problem-solving skills
- Strong oral and written communication skills in English
- Teamworker

Skills Preferred but not required

- Experience with iOS, Swift, SwiftUI, Objective-C, XCode
- Experience with Android, Kotlin, Java,
- Experience with React native
- German language skills

What we offer

- Full-time employment
- A great and motivated team of experts
- Innovative projects and great opportunities for further education
- Beautiful offices in a central location at 22@, Barcelona
- Good connection to public transport
- Variety of lunch offers in the neighborhood
- Good work-life balance and flexible working hours
- Free drinks (coffee, water, juices)
- Employee Benefits with Banco Sabadell
- Employee Benefits for further education byGrupoPlaneta
- Access to DATAGROUP SE corporate benefits program
- Remote work

About Almato

Almato is a 100% subsidiary of the listed DATAGROUP SE. The company is one of the leading providers of software and services for the intelligent digitalisation of companies. With Almato software, companies automate and mobilise their business processes. The applications include Robotic Process Automation (RPA), Digital Assistants, intelligent apps, ready-made software robots, machine learning services as well as complete solutions for individual tasks such as workforce management.

Companies from all industries use Almato¬¥s software to reduce their costs and improve their service. Almato¬¥s customers include Aida, Deichmann, Deutsche Telekom, H&M, Innogy, Lands End, Lidl,Sparda, Santander, and Tchibo.

Almato maintains partnerships as a value-added reseller with globally important technology providers such as Abbyy, Automation Anywhere, Nuance, SAP, and UiPath and employs more than 120 people at locations in Bonn, Duisburg, Hamburg, Reutlingen, Stuttgart, and Barcelona.

jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer/ Android
jobs_results.description:
Who we are

We simplify wealth creation. Founded in 2014 in Vienna, Austria by Eric Demuth, Paul Klanschek and Christian Trummer, we‚Äôre here to help people trust themselves enough to build their financial freedom ‚Äî for now and the future. Our user-friendly, trade-everything platform empowers both first-time investors and seasoned experts to invest in the cryptocurrencies, crypto indices, stocks*, precious metals and commodities* they want ‚Äî with any sized budget, 24/7. Our global team works across different cultures and time zones, bringing our products to more than 4 million customers, making us one of Europe‚Äôs safest and most secure platforms that powers modern investing.

Headquartered in Austria but operating across Europe, our products are built by fast-moving, talented, ‚Äúroll-up-your-sleeves-and-make-it-happen‚Äù kind of people. It‚Äôs these diverse perspectives and innovative minds operating as ONE TEAM that keep Bitpanda at the cutting edge of our industry. So if you‚Äôre someone who thinks big, moves fast and wants to make an impact right from day one, then get ready to join our industry-changing team. Let‚Äôs go!

Your mission

As a Senior Android Developer at Bitpanda, you will work on the development of our native Android app infrastructure as part of a core mobile platform team. You will be responsible for shaping the architecture of our Android application by driving key initiatives to ensure its quality, scalability, and resilience.

What you'll do
‚Ä¢ Design and maintain the Android app architecture to ensure a robust foundation.
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews to uphold consistency and quality across the codebase.
‚Ä¢ Establish best practices, document guidelines, and mentor fellow Android developers.
‚Ä¢ Communicate effectively and work independently to support team goals.
‚Ä¢ Build and enhance modules and developer tools that empower the Android team to deliver high-quality code efficiently

Who you are
‚Ä¢ Excellent knowledge of Kotlin, Coroutines, Hilt and Retrofit.
‚Ä¢ Proficient in architecture patterns such as MVVM
‚Ä¢ Experience in managing and publishing Android applications on Google Play in a professional environment.
‚Ä¢ Solid knowledge of UI testing frameworks like Espresso and UI Automator
‚Ä¢ Good understanding of CI/CD pipelines - experience with GitLab CI is a plus

What‚Äôs in it for you
‚Ä¢ We're proud of our flexible working model that includes 2 days (minimum) working from the local Hub, plus 60 Work From Anywhere days annually
‚Ä¢ Total compensation package including participation in our Bitpanda stock option plan
‚Ä¢ Competitive benefits programs and policies shaped by our flexibility-first philosophy
‚Ä¢ Exclusive premiums when trading on Bitpanda
‚Ä¢ Company-wide and team events ‚Äî both in-person and virtually!
‚Ä¢ Bitpanda swag to keep you living the brand

And, above all, the opportunity to learn and grow as part of Bitpanda‚Äôs incredible journey towards being Europe‚Äôs future #1 investment platform.

Bitpanda is committed to fostering a fair and equal environment based on trust and mutual respect. We believe that a diverse and inclusive workplace is paramount to our success and we are committed to building a team that represents a wide variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills.

jobs_results.title: Highly Skilled Android Developer Wanted
jobs_results.description:
At Solera Corporation, we are a leading provider of innovative digital identity and authentication solutions. Our mission is to empower individuals and organizations to navigate the digital world securely and efficiently.
‚Ä¢ *Role Overview:**
We are seeking an experienced Senior Android Developer to join our technology team. As a critical member of our development team, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining advanced applications for the Android platform. Your key responsibilities include writing clean and efficient code, collaborating with cross-functional teams to define and design new features, troubleshooting and debugging to optimize performance, and ensuring the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applications.
‚Ä¢ *Key Responsibilities:**
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain Android applications using Java and Kotlin programming languages.
‚Ä¢ Implement UI/UX designs provided by the design team.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with product owners to define project requirements and scope.
‚Ä¢ Partner with designers to ensure the visual aspects align with the intended design.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with back-end developers to integrate RESTful APIs and other services.
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot and debug issues to enhance application performance.
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews to ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards.
‚Ä¢ Omitimize applications for maximum security and scalability.
‚Ä¢ Stay updated with the latest developments in the Android ecosystem.
‚Ä¢ Explore new technologies and frameworks to improve development processes.
‚Ä¢ Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions.
‚Ä¢ Work with QA engineers to ensure comprehensive testing and quality assurance.
‚Ä¢ Maintain detailed documentation for application development processes.
‚Ä¢ *What You'll Bring:**
Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in Android development
Proficiency in Kotlin programming languages
Strong understanding of Android SDK and handling different screen sizes
Experience with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services
Proficiency with Android Studio and version control systems, particularly Git
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
Strong communication and collaboration skills
Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work

The estimated annual salary for this position is around $120,000-$150,000 based on industry standards and location. We offer competitive benefits, including health insurance, retirement plans, and paid time off, to support your well-being and career growth.

jobs_results.title: Chief Android Developer for Medical Devices
jobs_results.description:
About Us: Inbrain Neuroelectronics is a pioneering company that develops innovative medical devices. We are looking for a highly skilled Chief Android Developer to join our team.

Estimated Salary: $120,000 - $180,000 per year.

Job Description: As a Chief Android Developer at Inbrain Neuroelectronics, you will be responsible for developing high-quality Android applications for active implantable medical devices. Your primary focus will be on creating robust and efficient software solutions that meet the strict regulatory requirements of the medical industry.

ResponsibilitiesÔºö
‚Ä¢ Developing Android applications for active implantable medical devices
‚Ä¢ Designing and implementing software architecture to ensure scalability and reliability
‚Ä¢ Collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements
‚Ä¢ Conducting technical feasibility studies and contributing to technical concepts
‚Ä¢ Setting up demo environments for internal teams and ensuring seamless integration
‚Ä¢ Applying Agile and Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) principles to maximize quality, performance, and effectiveness
‚Ä¢ Performing functional analysis and creating system designs that meet requirements
‚Ä¢ Developing automated and manual tests to characterize and verify sub-systems
‚Ä¢ Ensuring traceability between requirements, test cases, verification, and reports

Your Profile: To succeed in this role, you should have a strong engineering background, preferably in computer science, and relevant experience in app development. You should also be familiar with scrum and agile methodology, as well as Bluetooth communication protocols and software build and test infrastructures. Additionally, you should have a clear vision of how an Android application should be built and why, and be able to contribute to technical reviews, design reviews, and milestone reviews.

RequirementsÔºö
‚Ä¢ Relevant app development experience of at least 5 years
‚Ä¢ Strong engineering background, preferably in computer science
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with scrum and agile methodology and tools
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Bluetooth communication protocols
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with software build and test infrastructures
‚Ä¢ Clear vision of how an Android application should be built and why
‚Ä¢ Ability to contribute to technical reviews, design reviews, and milestone reviews

Why Choose Us?ÔºöAt Inbrain Neuroelectronics, we believe in shared success and diverse ways of thinking. We offer a collaborative and dynamic work environment where you can learn, grow, and advance in your career. If you are a motivated and proactive individual who is passionate about developing high-quality software solutions, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer - Development - Openbank (Openhub Mexico)
jobs_results.description:
Android Developer - Development - Openbank (Openhub Mexico)
Android Developer - Development - Openbank (Openhub Mexico)

Open Digital Services is a tech company with a unique culture, dedicated to creating innovative products for Santander Group Affiliates. Open Digital Services is part of the Retail & Commercial Division of Santander Group, one of the world's largest financial institutions and the Eurozone's leader. We're committed to being the best Digital Bank with Branches in the industry.

Our mission at ODS is to design and support an advanced digital and omnichannel platform, ensuring the best customer experience using cutting-edge technology. Openbank, our flagship partner, is where we develop our most advanced concepts. Be part of our Best-in-Class tech team and help us create unique value for our customers!

Join us to tackle exciting tech challenges in an agile environment, benefiting from learning, growth, and local and international career opportunities in a modern, diverse setting.

Mission and responsibilities:

We want to take our customers' digital experience to a new level and you will help us innovate in digital product development in banking.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ You will be responsible for Android developments, helping to add value to Openbank Apps, as part of a multidisciplinary team of professionals.
‚Ä¢ You will bring your knowledge and experience to the team, proposing ideas for continuous improvement.
‚Ä¢ You will participate in code review and contribute to improve common practices.
‚Ä¢ You will be responsible for your own proofs of concept to add value to the product.

To be successful in the role you must have:
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or other related field, or equivalent work experience.
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience in software development.
‚Ä¢ Experience and deep knowledge of Java, Android SDK, and Kotlin.
‚Ä¢ Experience with REST and SOAP integrations.
‚Ä¢ In-depth knowledge of development patterns.
‚Ä¢ Advanced knowledge of mobile application performance optimization.
‚Ä¢ Experience working with design teams to optimize the final customer experience.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of agile methodology, Scrum, and Kanban.
‚Ä¢ Passion for technology and start-up methodology.
‚Ä¢ Ability to learn quickly, creativity, and initiative.
‚Ä¢ Ability to make autonomous decisions.
‚Ä¢ Results-oriented.
‚Ä¢ Team player.
‚Ä¢ Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.

What do we offer?
‚Ä¢ Immediate incorporation to a dynamic and agile company with a growth and expansion project.
‚Ä¢ Working in start-up mode with the support of Grupo Santander.
‚Ä¢ Competitive remuneration and attractive benefits package.
‚Ä¢ Possibility of growth within the company and the Group.
‚Ä¢ Collaboration in international projects and possibility of contact with different countries.
‚Ä¢ Excellent work environment, social clubs, and frequent events.

Would you like to grow with us? Join our team!

Openbank is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered as equal without paying attention to gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, age, political orientation, union membership, nor disability status.

We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify, and build.

If you‚Äôre not currently living in Madrid or Valencia and you are open to relocate, we would still love to consider your application.
#J-18808-Ljbffr
